name: nnlds-myanmar-tokenizer
description: NNLDS Myanmar Tokenizer for CLI and API use

scripts.test: node -e "const { createMultilingualTokenizer } = require('./myanmar_tokenizer'); const tokenizer = createMultilingualTokenizer(); console.log(JSON.stringify(tokenizer.tokenize('မင်္ဂလာပါ'), null, 2));"

author: Your Name
